评论概述: Way Too Small and High Waters
评论详情: I got these for my 10 year old daughter to wear to school and I liked the bootcut because she doesn't like tight pants on her ankles. As soon as I pulled them from the package, we both laughed and said they looked like they were meant for her sister half her age. These are cut way too small - forget the size chart, it's not accurate at all. The waist is so tight and my daughter is skinny as it is, so they wouldn't fit a larger child. Not only that, but when she sits down, she says it squeezes her stomach and the pants are three inches above the ankles. Serious highwaters! Don't bother with these, totally unusable for us.

These are cute yoga pants.  My daughter loves the waist band.  It adds some nice flare to the pants.  These are really comfortable to wear and washed nicely.  They fit her as expected.  She can't wait for cooler weather so she can wear them for longer.

These are a little more slim cut than what I was expecting but they do fit, probably if not for as long as I thought they would. They are definitely athleisure and the quality is just okay. Honestly, about what I would expect these days. The material, I definitely synthetic, feels like it's got some decent durability to it. It's been a little too warm for her to wear this yet, but she is looking forward to it.
My daughter loves these pants & they are a little long on her. They are comfortable and stretchy and good for wearing to most casual outings.

Theyre ok, the fit is a little off but thats totally normal when you order clothes online, its so hard to tell. My daughter is 10, shes 49 inches tall around 80 pounds, and theyre a little tight on her. But theyll fit her younger sister perfect in a few months, so its not a total loss at all. Shes starting to get pickier about her clothes, and she just keeps saying she doesnt like the way the fabric feels (eye roll)
These fit as expected and seem to be good quality material so far

Fits my string bean 10 year old well, a little bit on the short side but fit her well overall, she loved the double panel front and said they were super comfortable.  She didn't complain about them all day, they are lightweight and the material feels good on the skin.  Not thin or see-through which is a huge plus for active kids.
